trans-unit.source: Manipulates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that has been applied by a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> action.
trans-unit.target: Kezeli a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> , amely által alkalmazott egy <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> művelet.

trans-unit.source: ## Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a ControllableStoryboardAction object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ##Szüneteltetése, folytatása, állítsa le vagy a Storyboard interaktív módon kell képesnek lennie szüneteltethető, ellenkező esetben a vezérlő folytatásához, vagy más módon szabályozhatja a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>interaktív módon, állítsa be a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>és ControllableStoryboardAction objektummal (például <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, vagy <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) átvehetik a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> Vezérlőpultjának</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Ha a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>nincs megadva, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>nem interaktív módon vezérelhető után azt kezdődött.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Lásd: [hogyan: használja az eseményindítók szabályozására, a Storyboard után kezdődik](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) további információt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> that began the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> you want to interactively control.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>, a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> , amely megkezdte a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> interaktív szabályozni szeretné.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> that began the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> you want to interactively control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>, a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> , amely megkezdte a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> interaktív szabályozni szeretné.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
